mapper.select: SELECT user_num as userNum, user_id as userId, password, name, gender, email, phone, status, user_role as userRole, udate, address, address_sub as addressSub, image FROM users WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into users(user_num, user_id, password, name, birth, gender, email, phone, status, user_role, udate, address, address_sub) values(users_seq.nextval, #{userId}, #{password}, #{name}, #{birth}, #{gender}, #{email}, #{phone}, 'Y', 'r01', sysdate, #{address}, #{addressSub})
